name: ICGM (ice cream gunner man)
description:
Welcome to ICGM (ice cream gunner man)! This project was made for the Hackingtons Game Jam! (made for the hackingtons gamejam) *Use full screen for the best experience (also so it works)*

(also made a trailer for some reason (kinda bad))

Backstory

Your a ice cream server who decided to go to the beach for a day and sell your ice cream. Unfortiantly, there are a lot of people (angry I must say) who want ice cream. Also theres a score thingy, hearts and a shop.

Features
  • A shop
  • 3 levels
  • enemies
  • a ice cream gun
  • music/sounds
  • health
  • other cool stuff
  • multiple flavors
Contact Info (dont spam my email) hackingtons user: CarterM email: alystin2@gmail.com Credits
